Mitigation.Textual:
Add the following curves to the server configuration:{add}
Remove the following curves from the server configuration:{remove}
Mitigation.Apache: The directive that handles this elements inside the configuration is SSLOpenSSLConfCmd groups. The separator for this directive is : and to disable an element it is necessary to remove it from the string.
Mitigation.Nginx:
The directive that handles this elements inside the configuration is ssl_ecdh_curve. The separator for this directive is : and to disable an element it is necessary to remove it from the string.
NOTE: this directive is only supported by Nginx 1.19.4 or higher.

< 1.0.2.Textual: NOTE: OpenSSL version < 1.0.2 can only use one curve at a time. If you want to use multiple curves, you must upgrade OpenSSL to version 1.0.2 or higher.

1024-long DH.Apache:
Run the following command to generate 1024 bits DH parameters: openssl dhparam 1024 >> /path/to/cert.
To remove 1024 bits DH keys run the following command: sed -i '/BEGIN DH PARAMETERS/,/END DH PARAMETERS/d' /path/to/cert.
1024-long DH.Nginx:
Run the following command to generate 1024 bits DH parameters: openssl dhparam 1024 %gt; /path/to/dhparams.
To remove 1024 bits DH keys disable the directive ssl_dhparam.
